attributes.action: Introduce Graduate Route for 2019/2020 academic year international students.
attributes.additional_details: 2019/2020 is a very hard year to the entire world, Despite UK government keen to support their citizens and businesses, as an temporary residents we have not given any support by Home Government, as we are graduating in 2019/2020 academic year, we want government to introduce Graduate route for 2019/2020 academic year international students as well, so we cannot feel leftovers and we will enlightened our skills into UK markets and try to practice what we learnt what we gained with our degrees.
attributes.background: As government has announced post study work visa for 2 years, planned to launch in summer 2021, Government should be introduce this route for 2019/2020 academic year students as well, We have came after the announcement and chose UK as the best destination of study. I urge government to debate this

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553137
